text: @BrookeBCNN @BreneBrown How is your dog doing?..Be sure to bathe him regularly he has fomites in fur so now obviously keep the pet with you avoid others petting him too. Now is a perfect time to see if pets can get #covid19 like your dog #Test. #coronavirus #SARSCoV2 #ncov2019 #2019ncov Get well soon :)
